title: Phil Spencer Comments on Halo Infinite's Delay - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.13.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about Halo possibly coming out in multiple installments, Epic making epic moves for Fortnite, and more.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
WE GOT BIG STREAMS on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
This afternoon at 2 pm, Greg continues his Halo: Combat Evolved playthrough.
Friday at 3 pm, Greg is participating in the Apocalypse Games in The Walking Dead: Saints and Sinners. See how long he can survive the undead.
Monday, Kinda Funny Games is doing the first ever stream of Samurai Jack: Battle Through Time! Catch it at 1:30pm PT: http://twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:50 - Xbox considered splitting Halo Infinite into sections - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:14:15 - Can you see the delay of Halo Infinite leading to a launch for the Series X that is as troubled as the launch of the One X? - Best Friends Q:Miro
00:23:15 - Epic’s getting around mobile app store fees - Andrew Webster@The Verge
00:27:25 - Is it just Epic making a pro consumer move? - Best Friends Q:Wispa
00:37:07 - Metro Series developer has been Acquired By Embracer Group - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:39:51 - Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1+2 Renames a move to honor it’s creator - Wesley LeBlanc @ IGN
00:45:00 - A fun one: PS4’s ‘Ghost Of Tsushima’ Is The Highest Fan-Rated Game Of The Entire Generation - Paul Tassi @ Forbes
00:48:50 -  QUIP
00:50:02 -  KLARNA
00:52:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:53:24 - To me this feels like Sony is lying about the game to pump up their launch lineup for PS5. What are your thoughts on this? - Grezick
01:00:35 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(Zoom/Twitter) - @theindieboy1
01:01:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Riana Manuel from What’s Good Games
